options.title: -a, --archive
options.description: same as -dR --preserve=all

options.title: -a, --archive
options.description: same as -dR --preserve=all

options.title: --attributes-only
options.description: don't copy the file data, just the attributes

options.title: --backup[=CONTROL]
options.description: make a backup of each existing destination file

options.title: -b
options.description: like --backup but does not accept an argument

options.title: --copy-contents
options.description: copy contents of special files when recursive

options.title: -d
options.description: same as --no-dereference --preserve=links

options.title: -f, --force
options.description: if an existing destination file cannot be opened, remove it and try again (this option is ignored when the -n option is also used)

options.title: -f, --force
options.description: if an existing destination file cannot be opened, remove it and try again (this option is ignored when the -n option is also used)

options.title: -i, --interactive
options.description: prompt before overwrite (overrides a previous -n option)

options.title: -i, --interactive
options.description: prompt before overwrite (overrides a previous -n option)

options.title: -H
options.description: follow command-line symbolic links in SOURCE

options.title: -l, --link
options.description: hard link files instead of copying

options.title: -l, --link
options.description: hard link files instead of copying

options.title: -L, --dereference
options.description: always follow symbolic links in SOURCE

options.title: -L, --dereference
options.description: always follow symbolic links in SOURCE

options.title: -n, --no-clobber
options.description: do not overwrite an existing file (overrides a previous -i option)

options.title: -n, --no-clobber
options.description: do not overwrite an existing file (overrides a previous -i option)

options.title: -P, --no-dereference
options.description: never follow symbolic links in SOURCE

options.title: -P, --no-dereference
options.description: never follow symbolic links in SOURCE

options.title: -p
options.description: same as --preserve=mode,ownership,timestamps

options.title: --preserve[=ATTR_LIST]
options.description: preserve the specified attributes (default: mode,ownership,timestamps), if possible additional attributes: context, links, xattr, all

options.title: --no-preserve=ATTR_LIST
options.description: don't preserve the specified attributes

options.title: --parents
options.description: use full source file name under DIRECTORY

options.title: -R, -r, --recursive
options.description: copy directories recursively

options.title: -R, -r, --recursive
options.description: copy directories recursively

options.title: -R, -r, --recursive
options.description: copy directories recursively

options.title: --reflink[=WHEN]
options.description: control clone/CoW copies. See below

options.title: --remove-destination
options.description: remove each existing destination file before attempting to open it (contrast with --force)

options.title: --sparse=WHEN
options.description: control creation of sparse files. See below

options.title: --strip-trailing-slashes
options.description: remove any trailing slashes from each SOURCE argument

options.title: -s, --symbolic-link
options.description: make symbolic links instead of copying

options.title: -s, --symbolic-link
options.description: make symbolic links instead of copying

options.title: -S, --suffix=SUFFIX
options.description: override the usual backup suffix

options.title: -S, --suffix=SUFFIX
options.description: override the usual backup suffix

options.title: -t, --target-directory=DIRECTORY
options.description: copy all SOURCE arguments into DIRECTORY

options.title: -t, --target-directory=DIRECTORY
options.description: copy all SOURCE arguments into DIRECTORY

options.title: -T, --no-target-directory
options.description: treat DEST as a normal file

options.title: -T, --no-target-directory
options.description: treat DEST as a normal file

options.title: -u, --update
options.description: copy only when the SOURCE file is newer than the destination file or when the destination file is missing

options.title: -u, --update
options.description: copy only when the SOURCE file is newer than the destination file or when the destination file is missing

options.title: -v, --verbose
options.description: explain what is being done

options.title: -v, --verbose
options.description: explain what is being done

options.title: -x, --one-file-system
options.description: stay on this file system

options.title: -x, --one-file-system
options.description: stay on this file system

options.title: -Z
options.description: set SELinux security context of destination file to default type

options.title: --context[=CTX]
options.description: like -Z, or if CTX is specified then set the SELinux or SMACK security context to CTX

options.title: --help
options.description: display this help and exit

options.title: --version
options.description: output version information and exit
